dcterms:description: The Blender dataset is used for evaluating the performance of NeRF algorithms, providing a set of RGB-D images with known poses around the represented objects.
dcterms:title: Blender dataset

dcterms:creator: Kangle Deng
Andrew Liu
Jun-Yan Zhu
Deva Ramanan
dcterms:description: DS-NeRF demonstrates how depth supervision improves the convergence rate for training NeRFs, aiding in the reconstruction of the environment's structure.
dcterms:title: DS-NeRF

dcterms:creator: Lin Yen-Chen

dcterms:description: iNeRF is utilized for pose estimation by inverting the mapping between pose and image, leveraging the differentiability of the volumetric rendering pipeline.
dcterms:title: iNeRF

dcterms:creator: Johannes L. Schonberger
Jan-Michael Frahm
dcterms:description: COLMAP is a structure-from-motion algorithm used to compute relative poses for training NeRF models.
dcterms:title: COLMAP
